name: Purple Creative
description: We are an independent design agency based in Clerkenwell, founded 24 years ago by three college friends, Steve Bewick, Andy Harding and Gary Westlake. Now employing 20 people, we are a creative agency producing a broad range of work in design disciplines including digital, branding, sales promotion, marketing communications and moving image.
